link_desc:
Template to check the end date of SSL certificates with HAproxy.

This template uses a discovery to check crt certificates and crt-list files containing multiple certificates.

The alerts are as follows:

  • 80days
  • 60 days
  • 30 days
  • 15 days
  • 7 days

Requirement :

Install jq

apt install jq

Zabbix must be able to read pem files

-rw-r----- 1 root zabbix 7149 Sep 10 13:31 xxx.pem

Zabbix must be able to read haproxy configuration files

-rw-r----- 1 root zabbix 10351 Sep 10 13:34 /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

Install template

  • Put haproxy_ssl.sh in /etc/zabbix/scripts
  • Put userparameter_haproxy_ssl.conf in /etc/zabbix//zabbix_agentd.conf.d/
  • Restart zabbix-agent

    service zabbix-agent restart

  • Add template to host
